verses.verse: The <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G4404>early,<s%> when it was <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4653>dark,<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and <S%G991>sees<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G142>taken<s%> away from the <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> she <S%G5143>runs,<s%> and <S%G2064>comes<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and to the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5368>loved,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, They have <S%G142>taken<s%> away the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> out of the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and we <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G4226>where<s%> they have <S%G5087>laid<s%> him.
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and that <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> they <S%G5143>ran<s%> <S%G1417>both<s%> <S%G3674>together:<s%> and the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> did <S%G4370>outrun<s%> <S%G5032><s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>
And he <S%G3879>stooping<s%> <S%G3879>down,<s%> and looking in, <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>clothes<s%> <S%G2749>lying;<s%> <S%G3305>yet<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> he not in.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G190>following<s%> him, and <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and <S%G2334>sees<s%> the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>clothes<s%> <S%G2749>lie,<s%>

And the <S%G4676>napkin,<s%> that was <S%G1909>about<s%> his <S%G2776>head,<s%> not <S%G2749>lying<s%> with the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>clothes,<s%> but <S%G1794>wrapped<s%> <S%G1794>together<s%> in a <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G5565>itself.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> in <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and he <S%G1492>saw,<s%> and <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
For as <S%G3764>yet<s%> they <S%G1492>knew<s%> not the <S%G1124>scripture,<s%> that he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1438>home.<s%>

But <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulcher<s%> <S%G2799>weeping:<s%> and as she <S%G2799>wept,<s%> she <S%G3879>stooped<s%> <S%G3879>down,<s%> and looked <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%>

And <S%G2334>sees<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2516>sitting,<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2776>head,<s%> and the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2749>lain.<s%>

And they <S%G3004>say<s%> to her, <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> why <S%G2799>weep<s%> you? She <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3754>Because<s%> they have <S%G142>taken<s%> away my <S%G2962>LORD,<s%> and I <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G4226>where<s%> they have <S%G5087>laid<s%> him.

And when she had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> she <S%G4762>turned<s%> herself <S%G3694>back,<s%> and <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>standing,<s%> and <S%G1492>knew<s%> not that it was <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> you? <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> you? She, <S%G1380>supposing<s%> him to be the <S%G2780>gardener,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Sir,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you have <S%G941>borne<s%> him hence, <S%G2036>tell<s%> me <S%G4226>where<s%> you have <S%G5087>laid<s%> him, and I will <S%G142>take<s%> him away.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, Mary. <S%G3137><s%> She <S%G4762>turned<s%> herself, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4462>Rabboni;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1320>Master.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G680>Touch<s%> me not; for I am not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G305>ascended<s%> to my <S%G3962>Father:<s%> but <S%G4198>go<s%> to my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G2036>say<s%> to them, I <S%G305>ascend<s%> to my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and to my <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> that she had <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>LORD,<s%> and that he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things to her.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> at <S%G3798>evening,<s%> being the <S%G3391>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> when the <S%G2374>doors<s%> were <S%G2808>shut<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> for <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you.

And when he had <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> he <S%G1166>showed<s%> to them his <S%G5495>hands<s%> and his <S%G4125>side.<s%> <S%G3767>Then<s%> were the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5463>glad,<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2962>LORD.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to them <S%G3825>again,<s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you: as my <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> me, <S%G2504>even<s%> so <S%G3992>send<s%> I you.
And when he had <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> he <S%G1720>breathed<s%> <S%G1720>on<s%> them, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2983>Receive<s%> you the <S%G40>Holy<s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%>

<S%G5100>Whose<s%> soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> you <S%G863>remit,<s%> they are <S%G863>remitted<s%> to them; and <S%G5100>whose<s%> soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> sins you <S%G2902>retain,<s%> they are retained. <S%G2902><s%>
But <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> was not with them <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came.<s%>

The <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, We have <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>LORD.<s%> But he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3362>Except<s%> I shall <S%G1492>see<s%> in his <S%G5495>hands<s%> the <S%G5179>print<s%> of the <S%G2247>nails,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> my <S%G1147>finger<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5179>print<s%> of the <S%G2247>nails,<s%> and <S%G906>thrust<s%> my <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G4125>side,<s%> I will not <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2080>within,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> with them: then <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%> being <S%G2808>shut,<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you.

<S%G1534>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G5342>Reach<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> your <S%G1147>finger,<s%> and <S%G2396>behold<s%> my <S%G5495>hands;<s%> and <S%G5342>reach<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> your <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and thrust <S%G906><s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G4125>side:<s%> and be not <S%G571>faithless,<s%> but believing. <S%G4103><s%>
And <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, My <S%G2962>LORD<s%> and my <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G3708>seen<s%> me, you have <S%G4100>believed:<s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they that have not <S%G1492>seen,<s%> and yet have believed. <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G975>book:<s%>

But <S%G5023>these<s%> are <S%G1125>written,<s%> that you might <S%G4100>believe<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and that <S%G4100>believing<s%> you might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> his <S%G3686>name.<s%>
